short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to insert lorem ipsum text in an html form input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool that lets a user easily add dynamically generated dummy text to HTML form inputs with just the keyboard. 

1) Focus on any input on your html form

2) lorem:s1 will add 1 sentence of dynamically generated lorem ipsum text or lorem:p1 will add 1 paragraph of dynamically generated lorem ipsum text. Change the number add more dynamic text in sentences or paragraphs.

The number following "s" or "p" determines how many sentences or paragraphs (respectively) are put in to the input
